headline: Halliburton, Schlumberger Brace for the Next Oil Slump
summary: Oilfield services providers are bracing for impact as several large E&P firms are cutting back on drilling programs.

raw.headline: Halliburton, Schlumberger Brace for the Next Oil Slump
raw.summary: Oilfield services providers are bracing for impact as several large E&P firms are cutting back on drilling programs.

headline: Helmerich & Payne Q2 Earnings Lag Estimates, Revenues Beat
summary: HP anticipates capital expenditures to be in the range of $360-$395 million for fiscal 2025, accompanied by approximately $595 million in depreciation and amortization expenses.

raw.headline: Helmerich & Payne Q2 Earnings Lag Estimates, Revenues Beat
raw.summary: HP anticipates capital expenditures to be in the range of $360-$395 million for fiscal 2025, accompanied by approximately $595 million in depreciation and amortization expenses.
